H^{\left[d^{n}\right]}=H^{\left[d\right]}\otimes\cdots\otimes H^{\left[d\right]}

W^{\left[d^{n}\right]}\left(s\right)=\left(1-s\right)\frac{1}{d^{n}}I^{(n)}+s% \left|\Psi\right\rangle\left\langle\Psi\right|

VERTBAR:| Psi CLOSE:rangle RELOP:equals FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start NUMBER:1 ARG:end ARG:start italic-square-root ARG:start italic-d ARG:end ARG:end SUMOP:sum POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-j RELOP:equals NUMBER:0 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start italic-d ADDOP:minus NUMBER:1 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end VERTBAR:| OVERACCENT:tilde ARG:start italic-j ARG:end CLOSE:rangle PERIOD:.
\left|\Psi\right\rangle=\frac{1}{\sqrt{d}}\sum_{j=0}^{d-1}\left|\tilde{j}% \right\rangle.

W^{[d^{n}]}(s)=\sum_{a}p\left(a\right)\rho^{\left(1\right)}\left(a\right)% \otimes\cdots\otimes\rho^{\left(n\right)}\left(a\right),

s\leq\left(1+d^{n-1}\right)^{-1},

W^{\left[d^{n}\right]}\left(s\right)=\frac{1}{1+d^{n-1}}\left(\frac{1}{d}\sum_% {j=0}^{d-1}\left|\tilde{j}\right\rangle\left\langle\tilde{j}\right|\right)+% \frac{d^{n-1}}{1+d^{n-1}}\left(\frac{1}{d^{n}}\left(I^{(n)}+\sum_{j\neq k}% \left|\tilde{j}\right\rangle\left\langle\tilde{k}\right|\right)\right).

\rho^{(n)}=\frac{1}{d^{n}}\left(I^{(n)}+\sum_{j\neq k}\zeta_{j}\left|\tilde{j}% \right\rangle\left\langle\tilde{k}\right|\zeta_{k}^{\ast}\right)

\rho^{(1)}=\frac{1}{d}\left(\sum_{j=0}^{d-1}\sum_{k=0}^{d-1}\zeta_{j}\left|j% \rangle\langle k\right|\zeta_{k}^{\ast}\right)

\sum_{m}{\bf w}_{r}^{(m)}=\zeta_{r}\sum_{m}z_{r}^{(m)}=0,\quad\sum_{m}\left({% \bf w}_{r}^{(m)}\right)^{2}=\zeta_{r}^{2}\sum_{m}\left(z_{r}^{(m)}\right)^{2}=% 0\text{, and\quad}\sum_{m}\left|{\bf w}_{r}^{(m)}\right|^{2}=4^{d}.
